auditLogs.description: Monitor system activities, security events, and user actions for compliance and security purposes.
auditLogs.recentLogsDesc: View the most recent system activities and security events

aiAgent.title: AI Compliance Assistant
aiAgent.subtitle: Chat with our AI assistant for compliance insights and support
aiAgent.description: Get instant help with compliance questions and procedures
aiAgent.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI Compliance Assistant. I can help you with AML compliance, KYC procedures, risk assessment, regulatory updates, and case management. What would you like to know?
aiAgent.placeholder: Ask me about compliance, regulations, or procedures...
aiAgent.keyboardHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
aiAgent.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
aiAgent.tipComplianceText: Get help with AML monitoring, KYC verification, and regulatory requirements.
aiAgent.tipRiskAssessmentText: Ask for explanations of risk scores, factors, and mitigation strategies.
aiAgent.tipCaseManagementText: Get guidance on investigating cases and following compliance procedures.
aiAgent.tipDocumentReviewText: Ask about document verification processes and requirements.
aiAgent.proTipText: Be specific in your questions. Instead of "Help with compliance," try "How do I investigate a high-risk transaction from a sanctioned country?"

profile.pageDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences.
profile.profileInformationDesc: Update your personal information and how others see you on the platform
profile.notificationsDesc: Configure how you want to receive notifications
profile.browserNotificationsDesc: Receive push notifications in your browser
profile.weeklySummaryDesc: Receive a weekly summary of compliance activities
profile.newCaseAlertsDesc: Be notified when a new compliance case is created
profile.highRiskAlertsDesc: Be notified of high-risk score changes
profile.displaySettingsDesc: Customize how Regulynx appears to you
profile.exportDataDesc: Download your personal data from the platform
profile.exportDesc: You can export all your personal data and activity history from the platform in various formats.

transactions.description: Manage and review recent transactions, apply filters, and monitor risk.
transactions.recentTransactionsDesc: Latest activity with status and risk score

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {{name}}. Here's your compliance overview for today.
dashboard.roleDescription: This determines which sidebar links and features are available.
dashboard.testRoles: To test other roles, log out and use a different demo account (e.g., `admin@regulynx.com`, `compliance@regulynx.com`). Password is `password`.
dashboard.riskScoreTrendDesc: 30-day historical view of average risk scores

documents.verificationDesc: Review the document and extracted information before verification
documents.uploadDesc: Upload a new document for KYC verification

kyc.title: KYC Verification Center

header.changeLanguageTooltip: Change the application language between English and Swedish

sarCenter.createSARDesc: Fill in the details to create a new suspicious activity report
sarCenter.matchesDialogDesc: Review transactions matching this pattern and take appropriate actions

aml.rulesEngineDesc: Evaluate transactions and users against 19 pre-defined risk rules
aml.noPatternsDesc: The system is continuously monitoring for suspicious patterns.
aml.structuringDesc: Multiple small transactions below reporting thresholds
